Reviews.Title: Camera works great
Reviews.Author: Runnerfromla
Reviews.Content: This camera allows me to monitor inside of my house. It works great. No problem pairing with the control monitor.

Reviews.Title: uniden video camera
Reviews.Author: petey
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup, great way to keep an eye on your house while I'm at work. Easy to sync to my android, Samsung galaxy phone.

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: Craig Kelly
Reviews.Content: It took a while to "pair" to my Uniden Guardian monitor.  They buried the "use only on channel 4" in the back of the manual.  But once I figured that out, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Doggie Watcher!
Reviews.Author: Derick
Reviews.Content: We have 2 dogs that we keep in our doggie room while we're at work or away for a couple of hours and this is a great way to check up on them while we're out. Works well with the Uniden Guardian SystemUniden Guardian Advanced Wireless Surveillanceand we can watch them from our smart phones. The camera is not HD quality but, it is a good, inexpensive way to monitor your home and its surroundings.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Indoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Edwena
Reviews.Content: This was added as a third camera to my Uniden system.  It was very easy to setup and it has very good picture quality.  We are very pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: E. Galang "-EDG-"
Reviews.Content: Can't really complain other than the fact the status light are rather bright...however nothing that a standard roll of electrical tape can't hide.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Guardian indoor camera
Reviews.Author: T. Bussabarger "Coca Cola Girl"
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful. Great reception, clear as a bell. This is great for a child's room to see what they are up to.

Reviews.Title: Great addition
Reviews.Author: Southern Cali HAM
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to add to my wife's Costco purchase of the Guardian CCTV that comes with 2 pack of camera and an Ipad like controller. A great buy for me coz i used my Amazon rewards for this baby. 0$ FREE SHIPPING !I stuck it in the glass window looking outside front door. Perfect shot of the guest or delivery guy. I just can't figure out how to get rid of LED glare at night because of the glass window in front  of the lens. Overall  it is a reliable piece instead of mounting a fake camera, just my IMHO.

Reviews.Title: Great product and small enough to place on dashboard.
Reviews.Author: Alice Cline
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and can place in any area in the house or just use for your vehicle. I have yet to set it up,

Reviews.Title: Convenient
Reviews.Author: SavingaDime
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is easy to move around should you wish to get another view of whatever you are securing. It also keeps recording for an hour after being unplugged. It does not have good distance recording, but I have other cameras for that. It is best if you are viewing things up close (no more than 10 or 15 feet away).

Reviews.Title: Recommended for indoor use.
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this unit - plugged in and paired it to the Uniden Guardian system and it was up and running.  Only reason for 4 stars..Loe light quality is a little lacking but still a good value for the $s

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Lammydi
Reviews.Content: Good quality built. Clear picture day and night. Fast shipping.  The camera operate very smooth and quiet. The set up was easy also.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Indoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Boogiegirl
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Instead of buying a baby monitor we bought this camera to go with our current Uniden system.  Saved money and will be able to use it for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Guardian Wireless Indoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Nick Poindexter
Reviews.Content: Works great!  Many uses, from watching kids at play to monitor of sleeping babies, regular house monitoring.  Really like the fact that it is so portable and has it's own rechargeable battery, allowing extended use away from a power source.  Great for looking into small places where direct eyesight is not possible.

Reviews.Title: No muss, no fuss.
Reviews.Author: Lewis Burchett
Reviews.Content: Worked seamlessly and as described.  Instructions were clear and the camera was recognized on the first try.Just read the instructions.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: collin
Reviews.Content: its just what i was looking for in a security camera. i would recomend it to anyone its grate. thanks

Reviews.Title: One of the best , also if we can get a smaller camera with same specification will be good
Reviews.Author: MOHAMMED SALEM
Reviews.Content: I liked it very must & I wish if we can get 360 ^ view.  also if we can get a smaller camera with same specification will be good

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Dr Terry
Reviews.Content: This portable camera completes my need for the fourth addition to my system.  Works as expected and I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Guardian GC43 Camera
Reviews.Author: Earl Lee Cooper Jr.
Reviews.Content: Very compatible with my existing system. Very easy to pair with console. Also was a lot cheaper that if purchased from retailer. Thanks !!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: R. lynch
Reviews.Content: I went to Amazon and looked up indoor security cameras, I found this one that works with my system. I bought it and it works.

Reviews.Title: Return two of it...
Reviews.Author: ALVIN
Reviews.Content: Bought two and return both... just won't startup after a day... the outdoors ones are more reliable as I've had them more almost a year.

Reviews.Title: Certainly not the same quality as the outdoor camers
Reviews.Author: Audiodave1
Reviews.Content: Just ok, serves the purpose for monitoring a room or 2 while away. I like it's low profile but its video quality looks nothing like my outdoor cameras even in optimal light...which is ok in my situation. I covered up the LED's with black tape, too bright for something that's supposed to be compact and not noticed. Wife Acceptance factor was teetering a bit at first,,,

Reviews.Title: Very reliable
Reviews.Author: SA
Reviews.Content: Very good picture, night vision excellent at 10-15 feet, good audio and video quality (this is not a HD camera). Easily connected to wifi and base station, sends email on motion detection. Please call uniden customer service for guidence for email setup, they were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: theresa pensick
Reviews.Content: It shows black and white only. I would not purchase this item I dont know if it is a refurb or what.

ProductInfo.Features:
Portable surveillance camera
Lightweight so it can be carried around easily
Constructed with durable materials so it won't easily break
ProductInfo.Name: Uniden Guardian Accessory Wireless Indoor Camera (GC43)
